{{drawgraph:

target.1 =
    function:mean,
    value:value,
    series:disk.throughput.read|m,
    groupby:gid nid device,
    condition:gid={gid} AND nid={id} type=physical,
    alias:read $tag_device,
    interval:1m,

target.2 =
    function:mean,
    value:value,
    series:disk.throughput.write|m,
    groupby:gid nid device,
    condition:gid={gid} AND nid={id} type=physical,
    alias:write $tag_device,
    interval:1m,

cfg.title = 'Disk throughput'
cfg.dashboardtitle = 'Node {nodename} ({gid}:{id}) disk throughput'
cfg.height = 275px
cfg.width = 500px
cfg.stack = true
cfg.fill = 3
cfg.y_format = MBs
cfg.datasource = influxdb_controller

}}
